name: Graves
title: the Outlaw
lore: Malcolm Graves is a wanted man in every realm, city-state, and empire he has visited. Tough, strong-willed, and above all, relentless, through his life of crime he has amassed (then invariably lost) a small fortune.
blurb: Malcolm Graves is a wanted man in every realm, city-state, and empire he has visited. Tough, strong-willed, and above all, relentless, through his life of crime he has amassed (then invariably lost) a small fortune.
allytips_0: Smoke Screen can be used both to escape and to set up a kill.
allytips_1: Using Quickdraw to get into range and delivering a point blank Buckshot can do lots of damage.
enemytips_0: Graves deals mostly physical damage so Armor is an effective counter.
enemytips_1: Leaving the Smoke Screen's area of effect removes the harmful effect immediately.

passive_description: Graves's shotgun holds two shells. After firing them he must reload. Each attack fires several bullets in a cone. Hitting an enemy with multiple bullets does bonus damage. These bullets cannot pass through units.
passive_sanitizedDescription: Graves's shotgun holds two shells. After firing them he must reload. Each attack fires several bullets in a cone. Hitting an enemy with multiple bullets does bonus damage. These bullets cannot pass through units.
